attributes.action: Change the ridiculous logo for the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today (4th June 2007) Lord Coe revealed the £400,000 logo for the 2012 Olympic games. It features no UK branding and none of the iconic symbols of London (in fact the word has been spelt without a captial 'L'). It looks like some juvenile graffiti and is an overwhelming disappointment!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
